mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT VALUES(STUDENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ st_pwd }, #{ st_name }, #{ st_ssn }, #{ st_level }, #{ st_mobile }, #{ st_phone }, #{ st_email }, #{ st_addr }, #{ ma_code })
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDENT SET st_pwd = #{ st_pwd }, st_name = #{ st_name }, st_ssn = #{ st_ssn }, st_level = #{ st_level }, st_mobile = #{ st_mobile }, st_phone = #{ st_phone }, st_email = #{ st_email }, st_addr = #{ st_addr }, ma_code = #{ ma_code } WHERE st_id = #{st_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM STUDENT ORDER BY ST_ID
SELECT * FROM STUDENT ORDER BY ST_ID WHERE ST_ID = #{st_id}
